dict.string: Clip uses speech recognition to detect "Clip That" voice commands to save moments from your glasses.
Clip needs microphone access to capture audio from your Ray-Ban Meta glasses.
Clip saves captured moments to your Photo Library so you can access them anytime.
Clip saves captured moments to your Photo Library.
Clip uses the camera to measure vitals with SmartSpectra.
Clip uses Bluetooth to connect to your Ray-Ban Meta glasses.
Clip uses Bluetooth to connect to your Ray-Ban Meta glasses.
Clip uses local network to communicate with your glasses.
Required to discover nearby glasses via Bluetooth
